price: 50. Waana u kala duwnay (badinnay) qaybinta (roobka, biyaha) inay waansamaan24, wayse diideen dadku badankiisu waxaan aheyn abaal dhac (gaalnimo).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
footnotes: 24. Waa inuu Alle awoodo inuu soo nooleyn karo meytida.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnāhu baynahum liyadhakkarū fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
